stimulusHtml: The horizontal wire shown on the right in the figure above will break when the tension in it exceeds the value Tmax. What is the maximum mass M that the hanging object can have without the horizontal wire breaking? (Assume the wire on the left does not break prior to the horizontal wire breaking.)
